<DIV>It depends on what one calls *evil*. If yelling out loud to us while in Yoga meditation and hearing strong foot steps outside the room can be considered something evil, I could say yes, but if not, I can say that it is quite disturbing, if my protector wouldn't appeared at the very moment, I would panicked a lot, cause I even didn't know of their existance. I practice Kundalini Yoga, and it's supposed that one must not believe on that, Yoga people says that is the mind, that  Kundalini can make your hear things, but I differ from them, cause I have the experience, and was very intense,  never happened before.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
